body:
Thomas,

thank you for the prompt answer. In fact, I didn't know about the GitHub
repository and I wrote my problem in the issues section of Google, sorry!

Going back to the topic, with the last version all works fine, thank you
again.

Best,
Giuseppe


2015-06-11 15:36 GMT+02:00 Thomas Bleicher <tbleicher at gmail.com>:



--
*Giuseppe De Michele*
